_sText:
Urban Neighborhood 2 - Hostage Rescue
by Will2k


Overview
--------
This map is a source remake of my own map cs_urban2 for counterstrike 1.5 from back in 2002. 

This is my 2nd conversion from Goldsrc to Source (after cs_calm_source last week). I used some free time to convert this map while working on a full fledged bomb/defuse map for CS source.

I used existing resources from CSS / HL2. No new textures/materials, no new sounds, no new models. I also kept the layout of the original map without adding new areas; however, I added lots of details and a 3D skybox.

The map is small to medium size fitting up to 20 players.



Installation
------------
Simply extract the 4 files in the zip archive to your \Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps folder

I have included a nav file for offline play with bots.

Enjoy the map and have fun playing it as I had fun making it


Will2k

December 28, 2010
